data.title: Robe Cocea Dress by ba&sh
data.meta_description: Rent Robe Cocea Dress by ba&sh only at Rent the Runway.
data.text:
This dress runs true to size. We recommend going one size up for backup (see following fit notes for exceptions).

BUST: Great for any cup size (comfortable room at bust)

WAIST: Straight, comfortable room throughout midsection

HIPS: Straight, comfortable room for hips

LENGTH:

Mid-thigh - (on a 5'6" model)

UNDERGARMENTS: May be worn with any standard bra

FABRIC: Fabric has no stretch

GREAT FOR: Apple, Hourglass, Athletic, Pear, Petite, Straight & Narrow, Full Bust body types

(Model's height is 5'10").
